nodes.documentation: Check if group already exists
nodes.name: checkGroupName

nodes.documentation:
Create public group. You can set the price which if someone wants to join the chat he should pay.
Extend information is in JSON formation.
Returns a id of the group
Emits a {CreateGroup} event
nodes.name: createPublicGroup

nodes.documentation:
Create a private group
Returns a id of the group
Emits a {CreateGroup} event
nodes.name: createPrivateGroup

nodes.documentation: Get the group name
nodes.name: getGroupName

nodes.documentation:
Modify name of a group
Emits a {ModifyGroupName} event
nodes.name: setGroupName

nodes.documentation: Count of group
nodes.name: countOf

nodes.documentation: Get the price
nodes.name: getPrice

nodes.documentation:
Set the price of a group-join
Emits a {ModifyGroupPrice} event.
nodes.name: setPrice

nodes.documentation: Get the extend information of a group.
nodes.name: getExtend

nodes.documentation:
Set the extend information of a group.
Emits a {ModifyGroupExtend} event.
nodes.name: setExtend

nodes.documentation: Get the encryptedAES of a group
nodes.name: getEncryptedAES

nodes.documentation:
Set the encryptedAES of a group
Emits a {UpgradeEncryptedAES} event.
nodes.name: setEncrypedAES

nodes.documentation:
Join a group
Emits a {JoinGroup} event
nodes.name: join

nodes.documentation:
Quit a group
Emits a {QuitGroup} event
nodes.name: quit

nodes.documentation:
The admin removes a member of a group
If be removed, then can't join again.
Emits a {RemoveMember} event
nodes.name: remove

nodes.documentation:
The admin bans a member of a group
Emits a {BanMember} event
nodes.name: ban

nodes.documentation:
The admin unbans a member of a group
Emits a {UnbanMember} event
nodes.name: unban

nodes.documentation: Check a member whether is banned
nodes.name: isBanned

nodes.documentation: Check a group if has this member
nodes.name: has

nodes.documentation: Set the upper limit of group chat.
nodes.name: setUpperLimit

nodes.documentation:
Change the owner to other address.
Emits a {ChangeGroupOwner} event.
nodes.name: changeOwnerOfGroup

nodes.documentation:
Send Message to a chat
The formation of message need to reference: https://github.com/CPChain/cpchain-dapps-message#methods
Emits a {SendMessage} event
nodes.name: sendMessage

nodes.documentation:
Ban all members exclude the owner, make this chat be a notify-only chat.
Emits a {BanAll} event.
nodes.name: banAll

nodes.documentation:
Unban all members.
Emits a {UnBanAll} event.
nodes.name: unbanAll

nodes.documentation:
Set the alias name in a group
Emits a {ModifyAliasName} event.
nodes.name: setAliasName

nodes.documentation: Get alias name of a member
nodes.name: getAliasName

nodes.documentation: Change the owner of the contract. If the address is a contract, the contract should be IAdmin.
nodes.name: changeOwner

ban(uint256,address).notice: The admin bans a member of a group Emits a {BanMember} event

banAll(uint256).notice: Ban all members exclude the owner, make this chat be a notify-only chat. Emits a {BanAll} event.

changeOwner(address).notice: Change the owner of the contract. If the address is a contract, the contract should be IAdmin.

changeOwnerOfGroup(uint256,address).notice: Change the owner to other address. Emits a {ChangeGroupOwner} event.

createPrivateGroup(string,uint256,string.notice: Create a private group Returns a id of the group Emits a {CreateGroup} event

createPublicGroup(string,string,uint256,.notice: Create public group. You can set the price which if someone wants to join the chat he should pay. Extend information is in JSON formation. Returns a id of the group Emits a {CreateGroup} event

getAliasName(uint256,address).notice: Get alias name of a member

getEncryptedAES(uint256).notice: Get the encryptedAES of a group

getExtend(uint256).notice: Get the extend information of a group.

has(uint256,address).notice: Check a group if has this member

isBanned(uint256,address).notice: Check a member whether is banned

join(uint256).notice: Join a group Emits a {JoinGroup} event

quit(uint256).notice: Quit a group Emits a {QuitGroup} event

remove(uint256,address).notice: The admin removes a member of a group If be removed, then can't join again. Emits a {RemoveMember} event

sendMessage(uint256,string).notice: Send Message to a chat The formation of message need to reference: https://github.com/CPChain/cpchain-dapps-message#methods Emits a {SendMessage} event

setAliasName(uint256,string).notice: Set the alias name in a group Emits a {ModifyAliasName} event.

setEncrypedAES(uint256,string).notice: Set the encryptedAES of a group Emits a {UpgradeEncryptedAES} event.

setExtend(uint256,string).notice: Set the extend information of a group. Emits a {ModifyGroupExtend} event.

setGroupName(uint256,string).notice: Modify name of a group Emits a {ModifyGroupName} event

setPrice(uint256,uint256).notice: Set the price of a group-join Emits a {ModifyGroupPrice} event.

setUpperLimit(uint256).notice: Set the upper limit of group chat.

unban(uint256,address).notice: The admin unbans a member of a group Emits a {UnbanMember} event

unbanAll(uint256).notice: Unban all members. Emits a {UnBanAll} event.
